General registration info.


## Fees

```{r, echo=F, results=F, message=F, warning=F}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(kableExtra)

fees_source <- read.csv(file = "registration-fees.csv") |> 
  mutate(Value = paste(Value, "CHF"))
  
```



```{r, echo=F}
fees_table <- fees_source |> 
  select(-Type) |> 
  kbl(col.names = c("Category", "Membership", "Value")) |> 
  kable_styling(full_width = TRUE)  |> 
  collapse_rows(columns = 1:2, valign = "top", ) |> 
  pack_rows("Early registration", 1, 6, indent = FALSE, background = c("#EAEAEA")) |> 
  pack_rows("Late registration", 7, 12, indent = FALSE, background = c("#EAEAEA")) |>
  column_spec(1:2, background = rep(c("white", "#EAEAEA"), length.out = nrow(fees_source)))

gsub("<thead>.*</thead>", "", fees_table)


```
